speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0216/2006 ) by Mr Ransdorf on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on nanoscience and nanotechnologies: An action plan for Europe 2005-2009 [ 2006/2004(INI) ].
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0216/2006 ) by Mr Ransdorf on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on nanoscience and nanotechnologies: An action plan for Europe 2005-2009 [ 2006/2004(INI) ].
